message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $12000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $9500. This is an excellent opportunity to secure a high-value item at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
